inclusion.criterion: Have neck pain that lasts longer than 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Volunteer patients diagnosed with chronic neck pain by a specialist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has not experienced neck pain for the last 1 year
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Having had cervical spine and shoulder surgery
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Neck pain caused by different pathologies (tumor, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, fracture, dislocation)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
